label: Regulatory Check
description: Checks ingredients or formulas against open regulatory data. Results are read-only and market-specific.

defaultInputs.name: Ingredient List
defaultInputs.description: List of ingredients or formula composition

defaultInputs.name: Target User
defaultInputs.description: Target user profile (gender and age group)

defaultOutputs.name: Regulatory CSV
defaultOutputs.description: Downloadable CSV file containing regulatory results
